name: Mutant Munchies
description:
"Do me a favor......go back to 1995...and STOP the Mutant Munchies!???!!?"  - Dad

  • A GMO -based viral mutation posses all human food to become earths greatest enemy....aka Mutant Munchies. 
  • Help the blue haired May destroy these pathetic mutant brats with mad guns. 
  •  Restore order by slowing down time, collecting weapons and smashing food to smithereens.
